response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product that is worth $1,500,000 to you. I am offering this exceptional item at a special price of $1,200,000, which represents an outstanding value considering its true worth and the benefits it offers. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. If you have any questions or would like more information about the product, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you on this exciting acquisition.", "product_price": 1200000}
